description:
A comfortable touring PFD featuring an ergonomic shaped torso. Lined hand-warmer pockets thaw your fingers during chilly pre-dawn launches to beat the afternoon anabatic winds. The cross-cinch straps keep the foam low on the torso for a good fit, even when swimming.

  • Construction combines 400-denier ripstop nylon shell and 200-denier nylon lining
  • Ergonomic Wrapture fit is easy to adjust for a snug and comfortable fit
  • 4-way accessory lash tabs on front and back shoulder
  • 2 lined handwarmer pockets and 2 large zippered front storage pockets
  • 3M® reflective strips on front and back
  • Adjustable shoulder straps
  • Chest circumfrence: S/M (83-99cm); L/XL (101–117cm); XXL (121-137cm)
name: Stohlquist Drifter PFD - Men's
